title: Fck league
body:
That feeling when u delete league and cant get the new client upgrade if any of u people at league see this please help....
why cant u add a SIMPLE BUTTON CALLED UPGRADE CLIENT

replies.body: I'd really like to help, but I don't really have enough info to go off of.  I know you're frustrated, but toss me some more details, like any errors you are getting, and I'll see what I can do.  By the way, the upgrade button should be available on the patcher to download the "open beta."  Hope that helps.

It did help but you should fix it so minions cant actually get stuck in towers and minion block WORK ON IT also, dont focus on minor things like emotes..... fix big thing like no one plays aatrox I've never seen a soraka in a long time, also never seen a jinx in a longgg time
